title: Increases mileage limit within which transportation for school children will be provided, including to nonpublic schools
summary: Increases the maximum mileage limitation for the transportation of children by school districts to and from school from 15 to 25 miles, the cost thereof is to be treated as an ordinary contingent expense; provides for transportation of pupils to nonpublic schools from such students' homes, applies to transportation whether such nonpublic school is within or without the school district.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the transportation of children residing in a school district
